item.title: About Me

Responsibilities â–ª Forecasted water levels and localized overflowed water tanks during storms by applying a temporal deep-learning model; reduced 25-30% total operation/maintenance costs and prevented pollution to DC's local rivers. â–ª Built an interactable explainable dashboard using the MDS algorithm for the literature database; provided new insights for stakeholders.
